t: How does Amazon's CVV policy work? - Quora
s: Answer: Amazon's CVV (Card Verification Value) policy typically requires customers to provide the three-digit CVV code located on the back of their credit or debit card during the checkout process. This adds an extra layer of security to ensure that the person making the purchase physically posse...
